Confusion and ignorance abound. The Holycause is about power. control and lies. Jews are evil.
These revisionists make me queasy, but let's face it:  they're there and free to their opinions.  Besides, it's wise to keep abreast of what these "people" are thinking and, if possible, why.

Jews are not evil. Never confuse FAITH with religous dogma. Understand that there are those who covet power. The  easiest way to maintain power is by having everyone at each others neck, while THEY pick our pockets. As soon as everyone understands that concept THEY will begin to lose their power. This thing in the middle east... they want to forment hatred so they can run another one of thier great wars. The Holocaust... well WWII was a Holocaust with over 80 million mostly middle and lower class PEOPLE dying. Most people can't see the forest for the trees. The media LIES to us MOST of the time. That includes MOST of the WWII propoganda that has somehow become the "TRUTH BY INDOCTRINATION". Wake up people. We need to walk in th LIGHT. The world needs PEACE, COMPASSION and LOVE!
